name: XLANG Schedule File
summary: Learn about .SKX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In order to update the SKX file, the corresponding XLANG schedule drawing (SKV file) must be recompiled.

description: Schedule generated from an XLANG schedule drawing (.SKV file) using BizTalk Orchestration Designer; saved in an XML format and contains tasks that can be executed by the XLANG Scheduler Engine.
